Interface playn.core.Layer

Added Methods
float rotation() Returns this layer's current rotation.
float scaleX() Returns this layer's current scale in the x direction.
float scaleY() Returns this layer's current scale in the y direction.
Layer setScaleX(float) Sets the current x scale of this layer.
Layer setScaleY(float) Sets the current y scale of this layer.
Layer setTx(float) Sets the x translation of this layer.
Layer setTy(float) Sets the y translation of this layer.
float tx() Returns this layer's current translation in the x direction.
float ty() Returns this layer's current translation in the y direction.
 

Changed Methods
Layer setAlpha(float) Change in return type from void to Layer.
 Set the global alpha value for this layer.
Layer setDepth(float) Change in return type from void to Layer.
 Updates this layer's depth.
Layer setHitTester(HitTester) Change in return type from void to Layer.
 Configures a custom hit tester for this layer.
Layer setInteractive(boolean) Change in return type from void to Layer.
 Configures this layer as reactive to clicks and touches, or not.
Layer setOrigin(float, float) Change in return type from void to Layer.
 Sets the origin of the layer.
Layer setRotation(float) Change in return type from void to Layer.
 Sets the current rotation of this layer, in radians.
Layer setShader(GLShader) Change in return type from void to Layer.
 Configures a custom shader for use when rendering this layer (and its children).
Layer setTranslation(float, float) Change in return type from void to Layer.
 Sets the x and y translation of this layer.
Layer setVisible(boolean) Change in return type from void to Layer.
 Configures this layer's visibility: if true, it will be rendered as normal, if false it and its children will not be rendered.
Layer setScale(float) Change in return type from void to Layer.
 Sets the current x and y scale of this layer to {@code scale}..
Layer setScale(float, float) Change in return type from void to Layer.
 Sets the current x and y scale of this layer.
